冒險家 Emphasis Or leave it empty and use the link text itself.
URLs and URLs in angle brackets will automatically get turned into links. http://www.example.com or http://www.example.com and sometimes example.com (but not on Github, for example).
Some text to show that the reference links can follow later.
Colons can be used to align columns.
職業 技能圖示 效果 劍士 HP低於15%時發動效果接下來的3秒內每秒恢復最大HP的35%(冷卻時間210秒) col 2 is centered $12 zebra stripes are neat $1 There must be at least 3 dashes separating each header cell. The outer pipes (|) are optional, and you don’t need to make the raw Markdown line up prettily. You can also use inline Markdown.
Markdown Less Pretty Still renders nicely 1 2 3 Image Youtube video
title: 全職業傳授技能
